:: Nightstar:.
 
She had been there by a big while... She was on line several time 
ago... But she wasn't sure how much or how she cames there. She had 
wlaked camly under nocturnal sky when she saw  them, She wasn't sure 
if she should feel scared or glad; scared 'cause he was an stranger 
or glad 'cause she found others members of her specie.
 
She stared along time wachting him but against her wills she did a 
little noise.
